Querying raw data

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

query_db[source]

query_db(db_path:str='../data/raw/statcast_pitches.db', year:str='2019', columns:str=`''*, **limit**=*None*, **verbose**=*True`*)

{% endraw %}

Identify all eligible game-pitcher combinations

This largely means filtering out openers

  • As defined by Tom Tango, an opener is an pitcher that starts the game and either
    • records less than or equal to 6 outs
    • faces less than or equal to 9 batters

For games where there was an "opener", I choose to drop the game entirely.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

:param col: string, column from which to create a new indicator column :param indicators: each time indicator occurs in col, assign a 1 to the indicator column :param indicator_col_names: name of new indicator columns :return:
